name: a rope in hand (for your other man)
name_original: a rope in hand (for your other man)
description:
you are dreaming. 

the same, old, familiar dream. 

and someone in the distance, blurry as a memory. soft as a sunset in fog. 

--- 

An incredibly early attempt to familiarise myself with coding in twine. Still trying to work out how it works prior to developing some plot bunnies further. 

Something undefined and honestly pretty questionable.
